Posts.EditableText:
It's not hard to customise... And really it's for dynamic room creation.

Say you wish to dynamically create rooms through a MUD. That way you can have your server going while you create more of the world - instead of constanty shutting down then re-loading.
Or if you want to have a room suddenly 'add-on' the the end of the current room, instead of hard-coding loads of if's, and changing the rooms description - all you need is to create a room to the north.
